definition: describing a rhythmic beating, a series of rapid tapping sounds, make light, rapid and repeated sounds
details:
adverb
- describing a rhythmic beating
= synonyms: pit-a-pat
- as of footsteps
= synonyms: pit-a-pat
noun
- a series of rapid tapping sounds
= example: a series of rapid tapping sounds
verb
- make light, rapid and repeated sounds
= synonyms: patter
- rain gently
= synonyms: spit
